name: hbs1
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

|- wi(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: The setvar ` x ` is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` when ` x ` and ` y ` are distinct. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.)
